  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CommunicationScript
extends com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
implements com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.CommunicationScriptService
     
  Accela Automation
  File: CommunicationScript.java
 
  Accela, Inc.
  Copyright (C): 2012-2014
 
  Description:
  The implementation for the communication script, which will be used by the scripters.

      • sendMessages

        public ScriptResult sendMessages(java.lang.String templateName,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> variables,
                        java.lang.String triggerEvent,
                        java.lang.String[][] relatedEntities)
                          throws com.accela.aa.exception.AAException
        Send messages. The param relatedEntities will be related to Email. The Example of relatedEntities: relatedEntities[][] ={{"RECORD","13CAP-00001033"},XXX}; The relatedEntities[0][0] should be "entityType". The relatedEntities[0][1] should be "AlterID". The relatedEntities[0].Length == 2 is require.
        Specified by:
        sendMessages in interface com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.CommunicationScriptService
        Parameters:
        templateName - the template name
        variables - the variables
        triggerEvent - the trigger event
        relatedEntities - the related entities
        Returns:
        the script result
        Throws:
        com.accela.aa.exception.AAException - the AA exception
